subject: Order #SSN1541
description_text:
Hi, I still have not received notification that the baseplate I ordered was
shipped yet or any idea when it will ship. I was hoping for an update. Last
I heard, last week the backorder shipment arrived at the US
distribution center, but hasnt shipped yet. Its been a week with no update.

Any idea when I can expect this? Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Aaron Cummings,     I noticed that your order has two tracking numbers. I believe one of them is for the base plate shipmentâ€”please take a look.
